code: import{CartActionTypes}from'./cart.types';export var ToggleCart=function ToggleCart(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeQuantity=function removeQuantity(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_QUANTITY,payload:item};};
